H0.text: Liquid, gas, vapor are the three common states of matter.

H1.text: Gas, liquid, and fluid are the three common states of matter.

H2.text: Solid, gas, and liquid are the three common states of matter.

H3.text: Solid, vapor, and liquid are the three common states of matter.

A4.text: Four states of matter are observable in everyday life: solid, liquid, gas, and plasma.

A5.text: Plasma is by far the most abundant of the four fundamental states; 99% of all ordinary matter in the universe is plasma.
